articles.content: An employee working at Red Rocks Amphitheater when the concert crowd was viciously pelted with hail Wednesday night was critical of the decision to delay the performance which, in his words, gave the… [+5485 chars]

articles.author: Jason Rantala
articles.title: Taylor Swift, Twin Cities Pride sell out hotels and pack light rail - CBS Minnesota
articles.description: Pride, the concert and an international Kiwanis convention are expected to bring in half a million people, and a lot of money into downtown Minneapolis.
articles.content: MINNEAPOLIS -- The excitement continues with night two of Taylor Swift's concert tour. Pride, the concert and an international Kiwanis convention are expected to bring in half a million people and a … [+2256 chars]
